title: Google play reviews
description: This actor scrapes app reviews from Google Play.

appId.title: Application id
appId.description: Application id on google play - in url address after 'id='

limit.title: Reviews limit
limit.description: Number of reviews to be scraped, maximum is 4000 reviews.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort by the most relevant by default. Set to 'newest' or 'rating' to change sort option.
